0.user_question: Artie has a flower stand at the Farmers Market. He sells three kinds of flowers: marigolds, petunias and begonias. If Artie sells 12 pots of marigolds, 9 pots of petunias and 17 pots of begonias, how much will he make?

ost_step.1: Identify the initial number of pots sold. The problem states Artie sells marigolds, petunias and begonias.
ost_step.2: Identify the final number of pots sold. Artie has 12 pots sold.
ost_step.3: Add up the total cost of 3 x $2.74 = $8.12.
